reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, with one noting it's not itchy at all. Customers describe it as warm for winter days, feeling like a warm blanket, and like its fit, with one noting the sleeves aren't baggy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and soft
items.body: Cute and comfy. Perfect around the house with just leggings and a tank top or dressed up for going out. I ordered my regular size and it fits just the way I want it to....I prefer my sweaters a little on the baggy side. Seems to be of great quality, it is super soft and I have not noticed any problems with the stitching. Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy!
items.body: Amazingly soft, warm, washes well and hang dry. As a cold person it keeps me very warm. Def worth the purchase, I got 3! Read more
items.author: Tierra

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars *Almost* perfect
items.body: I absolutely love this cozy sweater! The color, the texture, the warmth, the softnessâ€¦but unfortunately, it has a chemical smell I canâ€™t deal with. I have received other clothes with the same smell and never keep them. Sadly, I had to return this too and Iâ€™m so disappointed about itðŸ˜©ðŸ˜©ðŸ˜© Read more
items.author: AW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this sweater!
items.body: Super comfy. Super versatile. Easy to add style to any outfit. I bought this three years ago in yellow and it is probably my favorite fall/winter season sweater. I am still wearing the same one and it has held up very well. Thereâ€™s a little pilling after all this time but it still looks good. I am 5â€™ 3â€ but curvy so I got a medium and it is bigger, but thatâ€™s what I wanted. It probably falls mid-thigh on me. I often wear it as the only coverup on a fall day with just a solid colored waffle long sleeve and some jeans and boots. I was looking for a sweater for my daughter and this one came up and honestly, I might get myself another one in a different color! Read more
items.author: Mm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and well-made
items.body: I absolutely love this cardigan! It is so soft and comfy! Perfect for fall! Fits well and as well-made Read more
items.author: Crystal Ducote Matherne

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but sleeves fit awkward
items.body: Very comfy and soft, but a bit awkward in the sleeves. They are fitted at the wrist but gigantic in the upper arm. Unfortunately it looks very awkward so Iâ€™m returning it. Read more
items.author: Stephen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I need this in other colors as well!
items.body: Super cute cardigan! Itâ€™s so warm, oversized & pairs well with jeans, slacks, etc. I get so many compliments every single time I wear this cardigan. Read more
items.author: D. Branch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!!!!
items.body: Love the look love the comfort. Great color great value Read more
items.author: Tionne May

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Blue, Mint, Dark Grey, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Brick Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
